name: Girl's High School Love Story
description:
High School is over! Get ready for the Prom Party!
Your love story is so romantic! Your high school first crush likes you back and you secretly felt in love with him... Today he ask you to prom! How are you going to get ready for such a romantic date night? Dance the night away in this high school first love story! Get ready for your prom party love affair and prepare yourself for this big night with a killer makeover that will make your cute secret crush fall in love with you! Prom night is finally here!

- Keep nice your skin: You’ll be able to get spa treatments and get a facial cleaning so you feel fresh!
- Makeover time! Choose from tons of makeup items and style your hair in endless combinations to accent all your naturally beautiful features!
- Select dress up for prom Queen! Get ready for a stylish high school look!
- Choose the best tools to make yourself an astonishing prom Queen in one of the best girls games about love and secret high school crush!
- Your handsome love has arrived at your door! Do not get nervous!

Sometimes we cannot express our feelings to our first crush but with an amazing look your dream boyfriend will fall in love with you in tonight's prom party!
Fall in love with your high school crush! Be the Prom Queen and dance with your date! Get stylish, get fit, and dance away!
Will you get your first kiss in tonight's date?
